desc: CAREGuard+ with ZEN Anti-Microbial Technology Vital Health Supplies offers the latest PPE supplies that we can offer to our customers. Our business provides working solutions in the fight against Covid-19 for all types of industries, as well as individuals and small business.

layout.text: ATTENTION! Please check our minimum order requirements before placing an order. This will save on shipping costs. FOR CANADA ONLY: minimum of 2 boxes FOR THE UNITED STATES ONLY: minimum of 4 boxes FOR INTERNATIONAL: minimum of 6 boxes.
